rawText:
Mahesh Konchada Contact: +91-9642971300 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mahesh-konchada-996985150/ E-Mail: mkonchada0@gmail.com 
 
 Profile Summary  
Results-driven  Business  Analyst  with  a  strategic  blend  of  analytical  capabilities  and  stakeholder  management 
expertise.  Combining  a  strong  Computer  Science  foundation  with  proven  experience  in  data-driven  decision 
making,  requirements  analysis,  and  business  process  optimization.  Demonstrated  excellence  in  extracting 
actionable  insights  from  data,  translating  business  needs  into  technical  solutions,  and  communicating  complex 
concepts  to  diverse  audiences.  At  Asian  Paints,  I  leveraged  data  visualization  techniques  to  identify  growth 
opportunities and optimize territory performance through analytical dashboards. At Semiconsoul Technologies, I 
bridged  technical  teams  and  business  stakeholders  by  translating  intricate  technological  capabilities  into  clear 
business benefits. I excel in ambiguous environments, approaching challenges with analytical rigor and strategic 
thinking to deliver measurable business impact. 
Organizational Experience:   
Strategic Account Partner, Andolasoft Feb 2025- Present 
• Requirements Analysis & Solution Design: Analyzed client business needs across CRM, project 
management, and construction tool implementations, translating requirements into optimized solutions 
• Data-Driven Client Acquisition: Employed market analysis to identify and acquire high-value enterprise 
clients across diverse product categories, exceeding quarterly targets 
• Stakeholder Communication: Developed comprehensive documentation and presentations for all 
levels of client organizations, from operational teams to C-suite executives 
• Process Optimization: Streamlined client onboarding workflows, resulting in faster implementation and 
improved user adoption rates 
• Cross-Functional Collaboration: Identified strategic business opportunities through analysis of customer 
feedback and market trends, developing data-backed product improvement recommendation 
 
ASSISTANT MANAGEMENT TRAINEE, ASIAN PAINTS MAY 2024- NOV 2024 
• Leading a team of 5 across five territories, managing 600+ dealers and driving month-on-month sales growth 
through data-driven strategies. 
• Conducted market analyses leveraging data visualization techniques to identify growth opportunities, 
using insights to open new dealerships and expand market presence. 
• Spearheaded the creation of interactive dashboards visualizing key performance indicators and territory 
sales trends, enabling real-time monitoring of 600+ dealers and data-driven course correction strategies. 
• Implemented data-driven solutions to optimize sales processes, improve dealer payment cycles, and enhance 
overall territory performance. 
• Managed team performance through data-backed insights, setting targeted goals and providing analytical 
tools to improve efficiency. 
MANAGEMENT TRAINEE, SEMICONSOUL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LTD. FEB 2020 – JULY 2021 
• Pre-Sales and Solution Design: Collaborated with development teams to design comprehensive IoT solutions 
across Healthcare, Smart Factories, and Urban Infrastructure technologies 
• Technical Pitch Presentations: Developed and delivered compelling presentations showcasing IoT gateway 
middleware, device handling platforms, and transformative digital technologies 
• Solution Proposals and Documentation: Created detailed technical documentation addressing complex 
technological requirements in Indoor Tracking, Asset Monitoring, and Industrial IoT 
• Stakeholder Engagement: Served as a critical bridge between technical teams and business users, translating 
intricate technological capabilities into clear business benefits 
• Developed strategic solution proposals for diverse domains including Defence Electronics, Smart Cities, and 
IoT Gateway technologies, demonstrating expertise in innovative technological solutions 

 
Master of Business Administration in Marketing and Systems, Minor in strategy 
Xavier Institute of Management • Bhubaneshwar • 2024 
Bachelor of Technology (Computer science and engineering) 
Sri Venkateswara university college of engineering • TIRUPATI • 2019 
 
IT Skills  
 
• Data Management: DBMS (MySQL) 
• Languages: C, Python, SQL 
• AI Prompt Engineering 
• Visualization: Power BI & Tableau 
• Other Tools: MS PowerPoint, MS Excel, Orangescrum (Project Management), CRM Leaf 
 
Internships  
Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. -2023 
• Analyzed competitor offerings and customer behavior to propose differentiated strategies for expanding 
portfolio 
• Conducted comprehensive market research to identify potential growth areas in two-wheeler financing 
industry 
• Conducted customer surveys that yielded insights which were used to develop customer centric financing 
solutions 
• Identified and addressed key pain points in two-wheeler loan applications resulting in a reduction in TAT 
Archon Motors -2023 
• Conducted Marketing research to collect and analyze data to get insights about customer perception 
• Ideated customer engagement programs, loyalty initiatives and after sales support strategies 
ACV Tourism - 2023 
• Developed a brief 1-year Marketing Plan including the cost associated and Manpower required 
• Evaluated and optimized marketing channels, including social media to maximize reach 
 
Outlook Group -2022 
• Successfully pitched and sold outlook products to diverse customers and ensured customer retention 
• Collaborated with Marketing team to develop targeted sales campaigns, resulting in increase in sales 
 
Frienden Management -2019 
• Scheduled events, built relationships with potential clients and suggested inputs regarding marketing 
• Assisted themanagement in creating engaging content and managed company’s socialmedia and blogs 
 
Internshala -2018 
• Generated Leads by promoting Internshala brand, products, and their services 
• Hosted events like workshops, seminars, events and built relationships with students and faculty 
Major Certifications  
• AI Product Management Specialization by Duke University, Coursera 2024 
• IT Presales Management Masterclass, Udemy 2024 
• Certified in Marketing Research and Consumer Behavior, Coursera 2022 
• Certified in Positioning: What you need for a Successful Marketing Strategy, Coursera 2022 
• Certified in Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, Google 2020 
Academic Details

extractedData.name: Mahesh Konchada
extractedData.title: Strategic Account Partner
extractedData.summary: Results-driven Business Analyst with a strategic blend of analytical capabilities and stakeholder management expertise. Combining a strong Computer Science foundation with proven experience in data-driven decision making, requirements analysis, and business process optimization. Demonstrated excellence in extracting actionable insights from data, translating business needs into technical solutions, and communicating complex concepts to diverse audiences.

experience.description: Analyzed client business needs across CRM, project management, and construction tool implementations, translating requirements into optimized solutions. Employed market analysis to identify and acquire high-value enterprise clients across diverse product categories, exceeding quarterly targets. Developed comprehensive documentation and presentations for all levels of client organizations, from operational teams to C-suite executives. Streamlined client onboarding workflows, resulting in faster implementation and improved user adoption rates. Identified strategic business opportunities through analysis of customer feedback and market trends, developing data-backed product improvement recommendation.

Leading a team of 5 across five territories, managing 600+ dealers and driving month-on-month sales growth through data-driven strategies. Conducted market analyses leveraging data visualization techniques to identify growth opportunities, using insights to open new dealerships and expand market presence. Spearheaded the creation of interactive dashboards visualizing key performance indicators and territory sales trends, enabling real-time monitoring of 600+ dealers and data-driven course correction strategies. Implemented data-driven solutions to optimize sales processes, improve dealer payment cycles, and enhance overall territory performance. Managed team performance through data-backed insights, setting targeted goals and providing analytical tools to improve efficiency.

Collaborated with development teams to design comprehensive IoT solutions across Healthcare, Smart Factories, and Urban Infrastructure technologies. Developed and delivered compelling presentations showcasing IoT gateway middleware, device handling platforms, and transformative digital technologies. Created detailed technical documentation addressing complex technological requirements in Indoor Tracking, Asset Monitoring, and Industrial IoT. Served as a critical bridge between technical teams and business users, translating intricate technological capabilities into clear business benefits. Developed strategic solution proposals for diverse domains including Defence Electronics, Smart Cities, and IoT Gateway technologies, demonstrating expertise in innovative technological solutions.
